63.5500 * 1 Cu + 35.4500 * 2 Cl = 134.45: 1Cu * 63.5500g/mol Cu / 134.4500g/mol CuCl2(aq) * 100% = 47% Cu in CuCl2(aq) 2Cl * 35.4500g/mol Cl / 134.4500g/mol CuCl2(aq) * 100% = 52% Cl in CuCl2(aq)
207.2000 * 1 Pb + 35.4500 * 2 Cl = 278.1: 1Pb * 207.2000g/mol Pb / 278.1000g/mol PbCl2(s) * 100% = 74% Pb in PbCl2(s) 2Cl * 35.4500g/mol Cl / 278.1000g/mol PbCl2(s) * 100% = 25% Cl in PbCl2(s)
